Bracket_ComponentOrder Property

CDXML Name:ComponentOrder
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Bracket_ComponentOrder
CDX Constant Value:0x0A29
Data Size:INT16
Property of objects:kCDXObj_BracketedGroup
First written/read in:ChemDraw 7.0 / (not read)
Required?No

Description:

The component order associated with a BracketedGroup.

Component Orders should be provided as consecutive positive integers starting at 1 within each Bracketed Group. A Component Order of zero indicates an unordered component.

This property is relevent only for objects with a kCDXProp_Bracket_Usage of kCDXBracketUsage_Component.

If this property is absent:

The object is considered to have a component order of zero, meaning that it is considered to be unordered.
